TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MultiplayerSessionStates extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents high-level information about the state of a session.
Docs.example:
The following example shows the format of the JSON object that represents this class:
"results": [ { "xuid": "9876", "startTime": "2013-02-01T00:00:00Z", "sessionRef": { "scid": "foo", "templateName": "bar", "name": "session-seven" }, "accepted": 4, "status": "Active", "visibility": "Open", "joinRestriction": "Local", "myTurn": true, "keywords": [ "one", "two" ] } ]
